data.title: Beasley Media Group, LLC
data.text:
Beasley Media Group’s new ROCK 92.9/WBOS-FM, in conjunction with Miller Lite, will present Dave & Chuck the Freak’s .5k. The event will take place on Saturday, November 9th from 11 a.m. – 4 p.m. at Boston’s historic Faneuil Hall Marketplace, located at 4 S Market Street. There are thousands of 5k races in and around Boston, but Dave […]

Beasley Media Group, LLC; a subsidiary of Beasley Broadcast Group, Inc. (NASDAQ: BBGI) announces Detroit’s Oldies 94.7 HD2 officially transformed into 24/7 Christmas music, as of midnight on Friday, November 1, 2019. The first song that was played on the air was the holiday classic, “It’s Beginning to Look A Lot Like Christmas” by Johnny

Steve Hoffman has been named as the Program Director at KVGS-FM and APD at KOAS-FM in Las Vegas. He officially began his dual roles on Monday, October 14, 2019. Hoffman most recently served as a programming consultant for the past three years. Previously, he worked on the air at KSWD-FM in Los Angeles for 5

Beasley Media Group announces Legendary WMMR-FM Midday Personality Pierre Robert was celebrated among the inductees of the 2019 Philadelphia Music Alliance’s (PMA) Annual Walk of Fame. Other honorees included the Philadelphia Orchestra, The O’Jays, The Hooters, Evelyn “Champagne” King, Jody Gerson and Dorrance “Dodo” Hamilton. The ceremony kicked off at noon on Tuesday, October 22th

Beasley Media Group announces Gregory “G Moniy” Johnson has been promoted to Afternoon Drive Personality at Foxy 99/ WZFX-FM. He officially began his new position on October 1, 2019. Moniy, who has been with the company since 2006, most recently served as a part-time on-air personality. It’s great to see talent grow within,” said Beasley

Amanda “Lil Brownie” Pizana has been named as the new Co-host of the “Big Mama & the Wild Bunch” Morning Show on WXKB- FM in Ft. Myers. She will officially begin her new position on Monday, October 7, 2019. Pizana most recently spent the past four years serving as the nighttime on-air personality at KLIF-FM

Beasley Media Group, LLC. (NASDAQ: BBGI) proudly announces WBZ-FM/98.5 The Sports Hub in Boston, WRIF-FM and WMGK-FM, as well as Sports Hub Afternoon Drive Personalities Felger and Mazz, were named among the winners of the 2019 Marconi Awards. The event, presented by the National Association of Broadcasters (NAB), took place on Thursday, September 27th at the

Beasley Media Group LLC (NASDAQ: BBGI) proudly announces Joe Bell, vice president, and market manager of the company’s Philadelphia radio cluster and Shannon Shaffer, account executive at BMG Augusta, were named among the winners at the 2019 Radio Wayne Awards. The event took place on Thursday, September 26th at the Hilton Anatole during Annual Radio Show

Beasley Media Group, LLC., a subsidiary of Beasley Broadcast Group, Inc. (NASDAQ: BBGI) announces News Talk Radio 1450 AM WCTC will debut This Morning – America’s First News with Gordon Deal from 5am to 9am weekday mornings beginning on Monday, September 23 in New Jersey. Deal, whose highly successful show, which features a lively blend of

ABC News and Good Morning America Chief Meteorologist Ginger Zee, seen locally on 6ABC-TV weekdays at 7am and weekends at 8am, will be the official keynote speaker at 95.7 BEN FM’s 3rd annual Her Story Luncheon. The annual event will take place on Wednesday, September 18th (11:30a-2p) at Chima Steakhouse, located at 19th & JFK in Philadelphia. The luncheon will be hosted by
